actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to transfer the functions of the Passport Office to a new agency of the Department of State to be known as the "U.S. Passport Service", to establish a Passport Service fund to finance the operations of the U.S. Passport Service.

summary.text: Transfers the functions of the Passport Office to a new agency of the Department of State to be known as the "United States Passport Service". Establishes a Passport Service Fund to finance the operations of the United States Passport Service. Authorizes an initial appropriation of $20,000,000 to capitalize such fund.

titles.title: A bill to transfer the functions of the Passport Office to a new agency of the Department of State to be known as the "U.S. Passport Service", to establish a Passport Service fund to finance the operations of the U.S. Passport Service.
